channel.title: Little project I've been working on
channel.description:
This isn't on the official server, I'm just building it in single player.
I'm basically gonna build a city about 5 blocks above the ocean. Here's what I have so far, started about 2 hours ago. This thread will be kinda big btw.
About the tunnel: Leads from shore out to the city. The wood floor is approx. 60x4 blocks (I didn't count)
Tunnel: [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/oszp0i.jpg[/img]
Inside of tunnel: [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/35lwab5.jpg[/img]
About the city: The frame is 64x64 blocks. The walls will be 8 blocks high upon completion.
Top of staircase view: [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/des65h.jpg[/img]
Please comment what you think/how I could improve/suggestions etc

I’ll take a pic later
